name: The Veil (Nothing Exploded)
description:
Welcome, Director. 

The Facility and its team are at your disposal. We trust you to discover the origins of The Veil. 

Made for SA Game Jam 2021. Inspired by The Southern Reach Trilogy by Jeff VanderMeer. 

72 hour entry. Professional. 

By: 
Ben McInnes - @bsmcinnes
Adoné Kitching - @AdoneKitching

Image credits: 
'Gas Station' by Jeremy: https://www.flickr.com/photos/sooner4life/4673127206/  (adjustments made include: saturation, contrast, grain)

'Cibulka (Onion) Lookout Tower' by Marcus O. Bs: https://www.flickr.com/photos/fieldmuzick/51290553937/in/photolist-2m9nuKt-6zG9o...

'Edlingham ruins' by barnyz: https://www.flickr.com/photos/75487768@N04/36032289573/ (adjustments made include: saturation, contrast, grain)

Music credit: 
'Slow Dissolve' by Purple Planet Music: https://www.purple-planet.com/tracks/slow-dissolve
